entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:15 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 9:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -38.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -42.4°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:01 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:01 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 8:01 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
